諱.definition: to avoid mentioning; taboo word; name of deceased emperor or superior

諱疾忌醫.definition: hiding a sickness for fear of treatment (idiom); fig. concealing a fault to avoid criticism; to keep one's shortcomings secret; to refuse to listen to advice

諱稱.definition: euphemism; word used to avoid a taboo reference

諱莫如深.definition: important matter that must be kept secret (idiom); don't breathe a word of it to anyone!
